lang.name: en_CA
lang.key: Maintained by Madison Kelly (mkelly@alteeve.ca) for the rgmanager 'server' Scan Agent.
'server' Scan Agent
The 'libvirtd' daemon was set to start on boot in run-level 3 and/or 5 (3: [#!variable!3!#], 5: [#!variable!5!#]), turning it off again.
Failed to connect to database: [#!variable!name!#] on host: [#!variable!host!#:#!variable!port!#].
Failed to prepare the database query: [#!variable!query!#] on: [#!variable!server!#]. The error was: [#!variable!db_error!#].
Failed to execute the database query: [#!variable!query!#] on: [#!variable!server!#]. The error was: [#!variable!db_error!#].
Failed to read the file: [#!variable!shell_call!#]. The error was: [#!variable!error!#].
Starting #!string!scan_server_brand_0001!#:

-=] ScanCore - Agent - scan-server
DESCRIPTION
This agent reads and parses the 'libvirtd' data to collect information on servers via the 'virsh' tool.
SWITCHES
-h, -?, --help
Show this dialog and exit.
SUPPORT
https://alteeve.ca/w/Support Alteeve's Niche! Inc.
A new server named: [#!variable!name!#] has been found.

Details: * UUID: [#!variable!uuid!#] * Current Host: [#!variable!host!#] * Current State: [#!variable!state!#] * Start After: [#!variable!start_after!#] * Start Delay: [#!variable!start_delay!#] * Migration Type: [#!variable!migration_type!#] * Definition: ==== #!variable!definition!# ====
Will not be started

The server: [#!variable!old!#]'s name has changed to: [#!variable!new!#]:
Definition: ==== #!variable!new!# ====

The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s definition file has changed:
Difference: ==== #!variable!diff!# ====
New: ==== #!variable!new!# ====
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s host has changed: [#!variable!old!#] -> [#!variable!new!#]
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s host has been recorded as: [#!variable!new!#].
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s state has changed:[#!variable!old!#] -> [#!variable!new!#]
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s state has been recorded as: [#!variable!new!#].
The server with UUID: [#!variable!uuid!#]'s name has changed: [#!variable!old!#] -> [#!variable!new!#]
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s has moved to a new Anvil! system: [#!variable!anvil_name!#]:
The server: [#!variable!server!#] had the disc image: [#!variable!file!#] mounted, which no longer exists. The disc has been ejected.
The server: [#!variable!server_name!#] with UUID: [#!variable!server_uuid!#] wasn't found in this scan, ignoring it.
The server: [#!variable!server_name!#]'s definition file: [#!variable!definition_file!#] wasn't found. Skipping missing ISO file check.
The server: [#!variable!server_name!#]'s definition file: [#!variable!definition_file!#] exisits, but it appears the XML data inside it is missing or incomplete. Skipping missing ISO file check.
The server: [#!variable!server_name!#] was in a paused state, which isn't supposed to happen. A 'resume' was performed and the new state is: [#!variable!server_state!#].

The server: [#!variable!server_name!#] was stuck in a paused state, which should never happen. If this happened immediately after the server booted, then there should be no problems. If the server had been operating, you may need to check the consistency of the filesystems, databases or similar. A force-off was performed after a 'resume' failed. The server should be restarted by the Anvil! momentarily.
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s was running on: [#!variable!old!#] but has now shut down.
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s has been started on: [#!variable!new!#].
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s is stopped.
The server: [#!variable!server!#]'s has started.
Live
Cold (Power Cycle)
